pullRequest.title: Explode Creeper Effect and Ignition Condition
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
This PR adds an effect to start/stop the ignition process of a creeper. I also added a condition to check if a creeper is in the ignition process, which requires Paper 1.13+.

Target Minecraft Versions:     Paper 1.13+ for the full effect and condition OR Spigot 1.14+ for just partial effect functionality
Requirements:     Paper for the condition, and for the ability to stop the ignition process.
Related Issues:     None

commit.message: Add missing word in test. Woops

nodes.bodyText: Use proper annotations to indicate requirements.
Same here; there is an annotation for syntax requirements.
